author: wsjcom
title: Maybe the Drop in Student Visas Isn’t All That Bad
text:
“Foreign-Student Visas Drop” (U.S. News, March 12) offers a constructive analysis of the potential consequences from the Trump administration’s limit on visas for Chinese students. I believe, however, there is a larger, more consequential economic impact to the U.S. not addressed in your article.
As you point out, elite U.S. universities have a financial incentive to admit Chinese citizens. However, a university rejects an American student during its admission process when it accepts a student from China. How many of the latter...
